title: Ford's EV Pivot Will Be 'Profit Positive,' CEO Farley Says
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley explains why the automaker is overhauling its electric vehicle business after struggling for years to make it profitable. He speaks with Matt Miller on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
